attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THIS BYPASS IS LONG OVERDUE IT MUST BE A NIGHTMARE FOR PEOPLE LIVING IN MOTTRAM AND TINTWISTLE AND WORSE FOR ANYONE TRAVELLING BETWEEN MANCHESTER AND SHEFFIELD YOU NEVER KNOW HOW LONG IT WILL TAKE   (MINI-BUS OWNER)

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name. Please also write in upper and lower case.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
